title: [Psychology] Online laughter therapy sessions significantly reduced depression but had no effect on anxiety, stress, and loneliness among nursing students during the Covid-19 pandemic

[Biology] SARS-CoV-2 and SARS-CoV E proteins reduced the release of infectious HIV-1 yields by approximately 100-fold while MERS-CoV or HCoV-OC43 E proteins restricted HIV-1 infectivity to a lesser extent
